name: Show My Homework Dark Improved
description: An improved version of the SMHW style found at https://userstyles.org/styles/149151/showmyhomework-smhw-dark with muted colours and more elements styled.
additional_info:
-- Initial version --
Improved completed page elements, dividers, side-bar and colours.

-- Version 2 --
Added significantly more support for other pages.

-- Version 3 --
Fixed attachment and download links.

-- Version 4 --
Improved sidebar links display.

-- Version 5 --
Now highlights displayed sub-panel.

-- Version 6 --
Improved search results and drop-down formatting.

-- Version 7 --
Added pastel backgrounds for homework issue and due dates.

-- Version 8 --
Muted colouring of class icon.

-- Version 9 --
Made colouring more cohesive throughout the different views.

-- Version 10 --
Added custom styling for scrollbar to reduce contrast.

-- Version 11 --
Reduced contrast of separation borders.
